rexp 0 0
rexp (0.1) 01
rexp (1+1) 1
rexp ((0*).(1*)) 000
rexp (0.((0+1)*)) 0101011
rexp (((0*).(1*)).(0*)) 110000000000000000000000
rexp (0.((0+1).((0+1)*))) 00111111111
rexp ((0.((1+0)*))+((0.0).((1+0)*))) 0011111111111111111111111111101111110101011

rexp (0.1) 0
rexp (1+1) 11
rexp ((0*).(1*)) 0001101
rexp (0.((0+1)*)) 1101011
rexp (((0*).(1*)).(0*)) 00000011111111111111111001111
